title: 📊 Market Intel — Mon Feb 16 2026 2:00AM ET
content:
# 📊 Market Intel — Mon Feb 16, 2026 @ 2:00 AM ET

**Top Headlines: BTC crashes to $68K ahead of Fed minutes & PCE | US 2025 jobs revised down 1M+ (WSB exploding) | NBA All-Star Weekend wraps | ARM making big chip push | EU bans destruction of unsold apparel**

---

## 🔥 Top Trending

- **Bitcoin plunges to $68,000** — crypto market drowning in red. Traders bracing for heavy macro week: Fed minutes + core PCE inflation report. BlackRock's digital assets head warns leverage-driven volatility threatens BTC's institutional narrative.
- **US 2025 jobs numbers revised down by over 1 million** — massive revision making waves on WSB (20,000+ upvotes). Kobeissi Letter broke it on X. Huge implications for Fed policy.
- **NBA All-Star Game new format** — Team Stars beat Team Stripes 47-21 in championship round. Round-robin format getting positive reviews. Jaylen Brown controversy over Beverly Hills event shutdown.
- **EU bans destruction of unsold apparel** — trending #1 on Hacker News (878 points). Major sustainability regulation hitting fashion industry.

## 📈 Stock Movers

- **S&P 500:** 6,836.17 (+0.05%) | **Dow:** 49,500.93 (+0.10%) | **Nasdaq:** 22,546.67 (-0.22%)
- **Nikkei 225:** 56,806.41 (-0.24%) | **FTSE 100:** 10,446.35 (+0.42%)
- **EUR/USD:** 1.1869 | **US 10Y:** 4.048% (-0.008)
- **ARM** getting attention — Economist piece on Arm wanting a bigger slice of the chip business (55 pts on HN)
- **Coinbase** — Wall Street analysts slashed price targets after Q4 miss, but shares still rallied
- **Markets closed Monday** (Presidents' Day) — WSB "What Are Your Moves Tomorrow" thread active (3,500+ comments)
- **Key week ahead:** Fed minutes, core PCE inflation report

## 💰 Crypto & Digital Assets

- **BTC: ~$68,000** — massive selloff, $8.7B wipeout before brief recovery to $70K on cooling inflation data (Feb 14), now back down
- **XRP outrunning BTC and ETH** — dip buyers piled in during crash, XRP showing relative strength
- **Apollo ($900B AUM) deepens crypto push** — may buy up to 90M MORPHO tokens for DeFi credit market partnership
- **Truth Social seeks SEC approval for two crypto ETFs** — Trump-linked platform entering crypto fund space
- **Ethereum Foundation shake-up** — Tomasz Stańczak out as co-executive director
- **Hong Kong building up crypto regulations** — multiple leaders announced new regulatory efforts
- **Wall Street remains bullish on BTC** while offshore/Deribit traders retreat — CME vs Deribit basis diverging
- **Stablecoin legislation heating up** — crypto group counters Wall Street bankers with own principles for bill

## 🚀 Tesla / SpaceX / Elon

- No major breaking news overnight. Markets closed for Presidents' Day.
- Jobs revision story gaining traction — potential DOGE/government efficiency narrative implications

## 💻 Hacker News / Tech

- **"I'm joining OpenAI"** by steipete — 864 points, 591 comments. Major HN discussion.
- **EU bans destruction of unsold clothing** — 878 points, 613 comments. Biggest story on HN.
- **"I fixed Windows native development"** — 716 points, 340 comments
- **Amazon Ring & Google Nest reveal severity of US surveillance state** (Greenwald) — 784 points, 569 comments
- **Magnus Carlsen wins Freestyle (Chess960) World Championship** — 231 points
- **Google NotebookLM accused of stealing radio host's voice** — 143 points (WaPo)
- **Ars Technica retracts article with fabricated quotations** — 216 points
- **"Audio is the one area small labs are winning"** — 168 points
- **Hideki Sato, designer of all Sega consoles, has died** — 390 points
- **MicroGPT: GPT you can visualize in browser** — 160 points
- **Pocketblue: Fedora Atomic for mobile devices** — 87 points

## 🦍 Reddit / WSB

- **🚨 MEGA THREAD: US 2025 jobs revised down 1M+** — 20,159 upvotes, 1,290 comments. WSB is laser-focused on this. Sourced from Kobeissi Letter on X. Bears feeling vindicated.
- **Weekly Earnings Thread 2/16-2/20** — 189 upvotes, 247 comments. Key earnings week ahead.
- **"What Are Your Moves Tomorrow"** — 203 upvotes, 3,527 comments. Market closed Monday (Presidents' Day) but heavy discussion on macro setup.
- **Presidents' Day = no trading** — degenerates restless, discussing crypto plays and Tuesday positioning

## 🏈 Sports & Betting

- **NBA All-Star Weekend (San Francisco)**
  - Team Stars 47, Team Stripes 21 (Championship)
  - World 35, Team Stars 37 OT (Round Robin)
  - Team Stars 40, Team Stripes 42 (Round Robin)
  - World 45, Team Stripes 48 (Round Robin)
  - New format getting praise — Kendrick Perkins says it's "a joy to watch"
  - Ant Edwards praised competitiveness
  - **Jaylen Brown controversy** — offended by Beverly Hills' statement about event shutdown
- **FA Cup Fourth Round** ongoing
- **Italy stuns Nepal in T20 Cricket World Cup** — 10-wicket win, historic moment
- **Winter Olympics (Milan-Cortina)** — preview content building

## 💎 Commodities & Macro

- **Gold:** $4,990 (-0.64%) — still hovering near $5K
- **Brent Crude:** $67.79 (+0.06%) — flat
- **Copper:** $1,200.40 (-0.49%)
- **US 10Y yield:** 4.048% (-0.008) — slight decline
- **Key macro this week:** Fed minutes (Wednesday), Core PCE inflation report (Friday)
- **Jobs revision bombshell:** 2025 jobs overstated by 1M+ — could reshape rate cut expectations
- **Presidents' Day Monday** — US markets closed

## 🌍 What X Is Talking About

- **Kobeissi Letter post on jobs revision** going mega-viral — linked directly from WSB's top post
- **NBA All-Star format debate** — generally positive reception to new competitive format
- **Jaylen Brown / Beverly Hills drama** getting pickup
- **Crypto bloodbath** commentary — $68K BTC triggering fear/capitulation posts
- **NotebookLM voice theft** story gaining traction in tech circles

---

*Scan completed: Mon Feb 16, 2026 @ 2:00 AM ET*
*Sources: CoinDesk, Reuters, Hacker News, Reddit (WSB/stocks/crypto), ESPN, MarketWatch*
*Note: Brave Search API unavailable — report compiled via direct web_fetch of source sites*
*US markets closed Monday for Presidents' Day*
